title: Little Matterhorn, Big Panic
sub_head: Three days on an Alpine slope relieved my fear of skiing.
body:
Zermatt, Switzerland
Wind, speed and slippery groundâ€”what could go wrong? There is a reason why skiing, with its potential for vivid wipeouts and injuries, seems largely for the young. But my stepfather skied the Alps into his 80s and friends shamed me into giving it a try during a two-week holiday here.
